summary: This Oscar nominated film is the story of two men who are opposites, one gay, the other straight, one a fierce communist, the other a fierce individualist, one suspicious, the other accepting, and how they come to love each other.
cast: Jorge Perugorría|Vladimir Cruz|Mirta Ibarra|Francisco Gattorno|Joel Angelino|Marilyn Solaya|Andrés Cortina|Antonio Carmona|Ricardo Ávila|María Elena del Toro|Zolanda Oña|Diana Iris del Puerto
director: Directors: Tomás Gutiérrez Alea, Juan Carlos Tabío
title: Fresa y chocolate
